summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on August 9, 2019. It includes out-count forms, inmate rosters, daily logs, and a transfer receipt, showing inmate movements and assignments. Notably, it lists Jeffrey Epstein as an inmate in the facility on that date.

events.title: Inmate Movements and Transfers at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative records document various inmate movements, housing unit changes, and the transfer of three inmates (Booth, Bussey, Reyes) to USMS/SDNY custody.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Incarceration Record
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, with an 'ATTY' assignment and unassigned work status.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
The documents are routine Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from MCC New York, including out-counts, rosters, daily logs, and a transfer receipt.
Three inmates (Ronnell Booth, Javon Bussey, and Efrain Reyes) were transferred to USMS/SDNY custody on August 9, 2019.
Several inmates are listed with 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' or 'FS PM' (Food Service PM) assignments, indicating work details and special statuses.
The Warden of MCC New York at the time was L. N'Diaye, who signed off on the inmate transfer receipt.
